alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 2:47PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Nye County through 315 PM PDT... At 246 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 26 miles south of Blue Eagle Ranch, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Troy Peak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy to moderate rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
